pages.text: Complex potions require a Synthesis Station to brew but their effects are much more intriguing than mundane potions.
This potion will set on fire everything and everyone who has any contact with it. Be very cautious when handling it.
Injecting this may sound like a terrible idea, but its magical properties make it harmless to the target. Just make sure not to break the phial - this can cause violent and dangerous explosions.
Trapping light in a liquid form allows me to quickly illuminate a large area when necessary. It can even make other living beings glow for a short time.
This potion can make anyone feel so light that they start levitating for a short time.
The phial of levitation had an interesting effect, so I tried to strengthen it with glowstone. The result was disastrous. It can launch anything high into the air. Anything.

Thanks to magic of various creatures of The End, this potion can teleport the target a short distance. It also magically remembers its user and teleports them to it when spilled. Just be cautious: misuse can cause a clumsy alchemist to trap themselves in solid terrain.
This potion emits large amounts of dark, thick smoke, temporarily blinding the target and obstructing the vision of anyone around. Great for confusing your enemies.
